author: Intel(R) Corporation
hardware: 128 nodes with Xeon Platinum 8124M / 144 GB / 36 Cores (Amazon EC2 [c5.18xlarge])

misc.Intel(R) Machine Learning Scaling Librar: https://github.com/intel/MLSL, version l_mlsl_2018.0.003, also see https://github.com/intel/caffe/wiki/Multinode-guide#communication for introducation
misc.Data Set: please use raw lmdb for inference, to create raw lmdb you can use 'sh examples/imagenet/create_imagenet_raw.sh
misc.warmUp: the learning rate starts at 0.1, then it increases linearly per iteration for the first 3 epochs
